"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a33f2463687237f6af0100#post_53a33f2463687237f6af0100
A mecha joke, Basically, Even though Dai-guard looks like a Super robot, It is very realistic, I.E Other than Ignoring the square cube law, It's completely practical

There was this one episode where they made a drill arm, And it goes as well as you'd think it would

And Gurren lagann is themed around drills, So the joke is obvious
